Rulings.HAT:
● If this card is Tributed for a Cost (even for a Tribute Summon or to Special Summon Su), this card's effect must be Chain Link 1 on a new chain.
EG: You tribute this card for "Caius the Shadow Monarch". This card's effect is CL1, and Caius' is CL2.
● This effect is mandatory.
It will Trigger if Tributed for a Tribute Summon, for a Ritual Spell, or even to pay a cost of a Trap which Tributes.

PSCT.Vegas:
Ⓢ You can Special Summon this card (from your hand) by Tributing 1 "Hieratic" monster. 
① Once per turn: You can Tribute 1 other "Hieratic" monster from your hand/field, 
then target 1 monster your opponent controls; destroy that target. 
② If this card is Tributed: Special Summon 1 Dragon Normal Monster from your hand/Deck/GY, and make its ATK/DEF 0.
PSCT.Meadowlands:
Ⓢ You can Special Summon this card (from your hand) by Tributing 1 "Hieratic" monster. 
① Once per turn: You can Tribute 1 other "Hieratic" monster from your hand/field, 
then target 1 monster your opponent controls; destroy that target. 
② If this card is Tributed: Special Summon 1 Dragon Normal Monster from your hand/Deck/GY, and make its ATK/DEF 0.

PSCT.Base: You can Special Summon this card (from your hand) by Tributing 1 "Hieratic" monster. Once per turn: You can Tribute 1 "Hieratic" monster, except this card, from your hand or your side of the field, to target 1 monster your opponent controls; destroy that target. When this card is Tributed: Special Summon 1 Dragon-Type Normal Monster from your hand, Deck, or Graveyard, and make its ATK and DEF 0.
